name: Streadata.io API Gallery - api.video
description: This is a repository of api.video APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: api.video
apis.description: api.video is a scalable webservice able to encode on the go to facilitate immediate playback, enhancing viewer experiences across multiple devices and platforms. Start within minutes with a well-documented API.
